content: the minas designs are a playful celebration of color featuring an engaging 1x1 stranded colorwork pattern that captivates us with its rhythmic hues and constant shifts knit top down in our ideal yarn 100% uruguayan polwarth wool bred spun and hand-dyed by our artisans this vest brings the same modern relaxed silhouette as the minas sweater now in a vibrant new palette zinnia leo celadon peach blossom and tahiti **finished measurements** sizes - 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 bust circumference - 42 75 46 49 25 54 58 62 75 66 69 25 / 105 115 125 135 145 155 165 175 cm this garment has an oversized fit and is intended to be worn with about 8 / 20 cm of positive ease **yarn and quantities** manos del uruguay ideal 100% polwarth wool approx 220 yds / 200 mts per 100 g color a zinnia 1 1 1 1 2 2 2 2 skeins color b peach blossom 1 1 1 1 2 2 2 2 skeins color c tahiti 1 1 1 1 2 2 2 2 skeins color d celadon 1 1 1 1 2 2 2 2 skeins color e leo 1 1 1 1 2 2 2 2 skeins sample shown in pictures was knitted in a size 2
